Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-22020 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-22020 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.20.3-3, affected by CVE-2024-22020
